abstract: Trying to quell concerns over recent changes to Facebook’s privacy policy and platform, Elliot Schrage, vice president for public policy at Facebook, has agreed to answer reader questions.
snippet: Trying to quell concerns over recent changes to Facebook’s privacy policy and platform, Elliot Schrage, vice president for public policy at Facebook, has agreed to answer reader questions.
lead_paragraph: 5:00 p.m. | Updated  Readers, thank you for all of your submissions. Feel free to continue to comment below, but we are no longer accepting questions for Facebook. We are sending a list to Facebook this afternoon and plan to have a follow-up post on the Bits blog early next week. Stay tuned!
